item.title: He Drove 700 Miles to get it Fixed!
item.description: Go inside a challenging diagnosis. We'll show you the complex problem that stumped local shops and the reason why the owner chose to drive 700 miles to get it finally fixed.

item.title: Lotus Elise: Fixed with TOYOTA Corolla Parts!
item.description: What happens when an exotic sports car needs basic repairs? This video documents the surprising truth behind the Lotus Elise, showing how common, reliable Toyota Corolla parts were used to fix this high-performance machine.

item.title: Back When Hoovie Made This Mistake!
item.description: The Hoovie mistake he regretted most.

item.title: These Jeeps Eat Through Money!
item.description: Go inside the shop to learn the truth. We break down the major maintenance issues and expensive failures that cause these specific Jeep models to cost their owners thousands over time.

item.title: Cadillac Cars: Choices & Avoids!
item.description: Thinking of buying a Cadillac? This expert guide breaks down the full lineup, revealing the most reliable models to buy and the used cars with costly, common problems you should avoid.

item.title: We Did Some "Barbaric Testing"!
item.description: We needed to know the limits of this part, so we did some serious testing! This video documents the unfiltered, heavy-duty process of putting a piece of equipment through its paces to find its absolute breaking point.

item.title: Finding Problems as We Go!
item.description: What happens when a repair job keeps throwing out new problems? This video documents the honest reality of troubleshooting, showing the new issues we found as we went and the expert steps required to fix them all.

item.title: 6 Super Reliable Vehicles $6K-$8K
Is Your Car Ready to Take a Trip?
item.description: Planning a road trip? This essential guide shows you the must-do checks every car needs before a long journey, covering tires, fluids, and engine health to ensure a safe and worry-free ride.

item.title: Distributors Deleted! The CAR WIZARD shows how he removed them on his '78 Ferrari 308
item.description: Go inside the shop with CAR WIZARD for a complex job. This video documents the intricate process of removing the distributors on his 1978 Ferrari 308, detailing why this classic modification is done and the challenges involved.

item.title: Normally You Don't See This!
item.description: You don't normally see this! This video captures a rare discovery or a highly unusual repair process, detailing why this moment is unique and how we handled the unexpected situation.

item.title: Something is Pouring Down Here!
item.description: What happens when an unexpected leak hits the workshop? This video documents the urgent moments of diagnosing and stopping a major leak, showing the quick thinking required to prevent major damage.

item.title: So Many Unplanned Problems Came Out!
item.description: What happens when a simple job uncovers a mountain of issues? This video documents a challenging repair where so many unplanned problems came out, showing the unexpected costs and the expert troubleshooting required to fix them all.

item.title: One of my Favorite Rams Ever!
item.description: What makes this Ram truck a local favorite? This video breaks down the features, performance, and long-term durability of a top-rated Ram model, explaining why it's considered a legendary truck.

item.title: This Civic Si Noise Is A Mechanic's Worst Nightmare
item.description: What happens when a sound is impossible to diagnose? This video documents the complex troubleshooting on a Civic Si, showing the nightmare scenario of tracking down a mysterious noise that left the mechanic stumped.

item.title: An AMG on an Aston Martin?
item.description: This video explores the fascinating partnership that resulted in an Aston Martin running on an AMG engine. We break down the engine swap, showing the power, torque, and surprising reliability of this unique blend of luxury and performance.

item.title: This Aston Martin has been Mercedes Swapped!
item.description: What happens when a classic Aston Martin gets a powerful new engine? This video documents the complex and surprising project of installing a Mercedes engine into this British luxury car, showing the engineering challenges of the swap.

item.title: Everything in this Car is Compromised!
item.description: What happens when everything in a car is compromised? This video documents a challenging repair where we found multiple systemic failures, showing the complex process required to bring the vehicle back to a safe condition.

item.title: 90's Time Warp! Why does the CAR WIZARD have this minty 1990 Mustang GT fox body in his shop?
item.description: Go inside the shop with CAR WIZARD for a blast from the past! This video dives into the secrets of a mint-condition 1990 Mustang GT Fox Body, revealing why this classic muscle car is in the shop and what repairs it needs.

item.title: This Car has over 300,000 Miles!
item.description: What does a car look like after 300,000 miles on the road? This video documents the incredible endurance of this vehicle, revealing the secrets to its longevity and the maintenance required to keep it running.
